channel.title: [emulous] making more than one kind of attack
channel.description:
i know how to define an npcs attack such as a lesser demon or something that has just one attack it would go something like this case 82: //demon return 64;
but how would i make something such as jads attack or chaos elementals attack where it has more than one type of attack?

item.title: [emulous] making more than one kind of attack
item.dc:creator: @xnaraku xnaraku
item.description:
@xnaraku wrote:

i know how to define an npcs attack such as a lesser demon or something that has just one attack
it would go something like this
case 82: //demon
return 64;

but how would i make something such as jads attack or chaos elementals attack where it has more than one type of attack?

Read full topic
